original_text: All thine enemies have opened their mouth against thee: they hiss and gnash the teeth: they say, We have swallowed her up: certainly this is the day that we looked for; we have found, we have seen it.
korean_text: 네 모든 원수들은 너를 향하여 그들의 입을 벌리며 비웃고 이를 갈며 말하기를 우리가 그를 삼켰도다 우리가 바라던 날이 과연 이 날이라 우리가 얻기도 하고 보기도 하였다 하도다

sentences.original_text: All thine enemies have opened their mouth against thee
sentences.korean_translation: 네 모든 원수들이 너를 향해 입을 열었구나

sentences.original_text: they hiss and gnash the teeth
certainly this is the day that we looked for
we have found, we have seen it
